titleStmt.title: A further aud [sic] more particular account of the barbarous murther, of Philip Parry, Esq; committed by Mr. Thomas Bond, near Covent Garden, On Friday night last, being the 15th. of March 1700. As allso, [sic] how the coroners inquest brought it in willful murther, on Saturday last and of Mr. Thomas Vaughns being committed to Newgate, for being accessary to the said murther, and of his own son being set at liberty.

A further aud [sic] more particular account of the barbarous murther, of Philip Parry, Esq; committed by Mr. Thomas Bond, near Covent Garden, On Friday night last, being the 15th. of March 1700. As allso, [sic] how the coroners inquest brought it in willful murther, on Saturday last and of Mr. Thomas Vaughns being committed to Newgate, for being accessary to the said murther, and of his own son being set at liberty.

notesStmt.note: Wing A231 printed on the back.
Imperfect: foot of page damaged affecting imprint date.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
